title: Updated to A10 now home button won't work & apps won't close properly. Send help
content:
Upgraded to android 10.

Now after several restarts my home button doesn't work if I am in an app.

I can only use my back button to get to my home screen EXCEPT if messenger is open. No matter what I do messenger will not minimize.

Trued closing all apps and messenger still there.

Please help
